Wonderful upgrade for our well-loved Supersac
Lovely coloring, smooth texture that isn't hot or itchy, and seems to be doing well with the rough and tumble play of our little ones. We got it to replace an older cover, and this new cover is holding the Sac (over 15 years old!) better, helping it to stay round rather than flatten.

t
the big one
7/31/24
Sac Size:The BigOne
Fabric:Snow Owl Phur
Fill:Standard Foam
Room Size:Large Space
Features:Kid-friendly, Technology, Pet-friendly, Adaptability, Comfort, Durability, Style, Washability
The Big One
I will start with he is so big he has his own name now, my husband named him "Bob". And rightfully so. We decided to move and was wondering how we were ever going to get him out of out place. Well, we bought the shrink kit. All I can say is it was not at all easy and we never did get him shrunk down really at all. It was more frustration than anything, but we did manage to get him out and moved but the shrink kit is not easy like it says it is. There has to be a better way, but we still love Bob. Maybe just never plan on moving; he has his own space and leave it at that!!! We do have sectionals as well and love them. Overall, we love all the items, just moving the big one may just let him stay with new owners :-) But could not do that. We got him with us but I swear I will not move again!!!! :-)
Was this review helpful?

Features:Pet-Friendly
Sac Size:The BigOne
Fabric:Taupe Padded Velvet
Fill:Lovesoft
Room Size:Large Space
Features:Pet-friendly, Comfort, Style, Washability
Such a beautiful textured addition to a room!
So rich looking! Dove Channeled Phur is so luxurious looking and tailored the way only Lovesac does. Fan for life! The squattoman with this cover on it is a beautiful accent piece on its own due to its texture but we did purchase the Big One cover to match. We live in Florida and this is not "hot looking" at all but very unique and interesting. We have dogs who love to lounge and thanks to the washability there are NO WORRIES! I highly recommend this cover! Get it and you will be so happy with it!
Was this review helpful?
